√vlī 'crush'

present: [9.] vlīnāti etc.  vlināti etc.  

[perfect: vivlāya  ]

aorist: [4.] vleṣīs  

future: [1.] vleṣyati   -- [2.] vletā  

verbal: vlīna  blīna  -vlī́ya  

secondary: passive: vlīyate etc.  blīya-  vliyeran   -- intensive: avevlīyanta   -- desiderative: vivlīṣa-   -- causative: vlepayati  avivlipat  

derivatives: -vlaya  vlayana B.  vráyas? RV.
